monologue.text: The night of the Battle of the Bands has finally arrived.
The venue is packed, and the energy in the air is electric.
You've been preparing for this moment, every waking hour spent with the band, perfecting your set.
This is the moment where everything you've learned will be put to the test.
Boss, the record label scout and MC, steps on stage to introduce the next band.
You take a deep breath, reminding yourself of everything that brought you here.
